name: 12(+1) Box
description:
A nostalgic callback to the shareware box bundles of the late 1990s and early 2000s, the 12(+1) Box is a collection of thirteen shareware game demos bundled together in one convenient box at one low price.

What's Inside the Box? Something for everyone!

  1. The Monad: a simple cellular automaton simulation featuring a sandbox and a story campaign
  2. Silver and Iron: a top-down shooter featuring color-coded weapons and enemies
  3. Three Kingdoms Chess: a three player chess variant with peer-to-peer online multiplayer
  4. Fortress Terra: tower defense featuring terrain modification
  5. Battle Ranger: RPG-style turn based battles without the RPG
  6. Gaslit Office: spooky point and click adventure horror game
  7. Dragonfly: addictive side-scrolling shoot and loot featuring lootboxes
  8. Advent: Christmas themed visual novel featuring a haggling mini-game
  9. Red Nine: turn-based strategy war game featuring nine unique units
  10. Glow Worm: weird esoteric adventure game
  11. Mechanized: scrolling survival shooter game featuring automatic fire and randomized upgrades
  12. Rocket Security: a strange first-person horror adventure game plus a rocket launcher survival mini-game
  13. Lent: Easter themed romance visual novel
